data.name: labelIncludeTerms.Help
data.value: Select the terms for news entries to display by the module.

data.name: labelShowAllNews.Help
data.value: If checked, module will show all news on the site, ignoring 'IncludeTerms' setting.

data.name: labelThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Set width in px for generated thumbnail image.

data.name: ThumbnailWidth.Invalid
data.value: Thumbnail width must be an integer greater than 0.
